mapper.select: SELECT f.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM files file WHERE file.folder_id = f.id AND file.user_id = #{userId} AND file.file_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND file.delete_time IS NULL ) AS documentCount FROM folders f WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.folder_type = 'notebook' AND (#{content} IS NULL OR f.folder_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')) AND f.delete_time IS NULL ORDER BY f.sorted_order ASC

SELECT f.*, COUNT(file.id) AS documentCount -- 直接统计所有文件 FROM folders f LEFT JOIN files file ON f.id = file.folder_id AND file.user_id = #{userId} AND file.delete_time IS NULL WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.folder_type = 'notebook' AND f.delete_time IS NULL GROUP BY f.id ORDER BY f.sorted_order ASC
